tool_description: A highly maintained unofficial API. Get live and exact data as you see on: https://www.chrono24.com/
name: Chrono24 API
title: Chrono24 API

api_list.name: /watch-history
api_list.description:
you will get prices of each watch of last 5 years on this endpoint just like you see on the website.
Put any watch url:  https://www.chrono24.de/rolex/yacht-master-ii-116680--id32016666.htm

api_list.name: /watch-details
api_list.description:
Get any watch full details on this endpoint. 
Input any "Watch URL" like: https://www.chrono24.de/rolex/yacht-master-ii-116680--id32016666.htm
